document.full_text: the wealthy texas brothers samuel and charles wyly on thursday lost their bid to dismiss a u.s. securities and exchange commission lawsuit accusing them of orchestrating a $550 million securities fraud and committing insider trading.
document.title: wyly brothers lose bid to dismiss sec fraud suit
lines_and_colors: the wealthy texas brothers samuel and charles wyly on thursday lost their bid to dismiss a u.s. securities and exchange commission lawsuit accusing them of orchestrating a $550 million securities fraud and committing insider trading.
